ing: 1 (1.25 ounce) package McCormickÂ® Hot Chili Seasoning Mix
1 (8 ounce) package processed cheese food (such as Velveeta Â®), cut into cubes
des: "Kick off game day with a touchdown-worthy dip, loaded with ground bison meat, tomatoes and cheese. Bring it all together with the heat of McCormickÂ® Hot Chili Seasoning Mix. Garnish with sour cream and peppers, and get the snacking started with tortilla chips."
ins:
Brown meat and onion in large skillet on medium-high heat, about 5 minutes. Drain fat.
Stir in tomatoes and seasoning mix. Bring to boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in cheese. Simmer 5 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Spoon into serving bowl. Top with sour cream and jalapeno. Serve with tortilla chips.
